structure.unit: ARTICLE VIIA. MOTOR VEHICLE REPAIR ORDINANCE

law.catch_line: Prohibition on publication of written advertisements without registration number.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-161.37. Prohibition on publication of written advertisements without registration number.
No person may knowingly publish an advertisement in any publication which is primarily circulated, displayed, distributed or marketed within Miami-Dade County, Florida, which advertisement identifies a motor vehicle repair shop offering repair work regulated by this article, unless the advertisement includes the registration number issued by the Director.
For the purposes of this section, any advertisement shall be defined to include any announcement, listing, display, entry or other written statement of whatever nature or kind, and specifically to include a name and address or telephone number placed under a heading, where the heading describes or encompasses any kind of repair work regulated under this article.
